resources.string: i-Komyut is a Smart Transit System designed to help commuters residing in the city of Cabuyao, Laguna, commute efficiently.

The location may not be the scope of the system or some of the locations are restricted causing the system to fail to find the location. Additionally, the i-Komyut is based on Google Maps, which means only locations that is visible to Google Maps around the City of Cabuyao Laguna are visible to the system.
Franchised tricycle have a franchised sticker displayed on their windshield. To know more further, locate the "How to know if" button in the setting page.
The TODA route plans can be viewed at the Transit Tab in setting page.
i-Komyut is only exclusive to areas in the City of Cabuyao.
i-Komyut is an android-based smart transit system which means it is not compatible with other operating system such as Apple OS.

Commuters who are student, senior citizen, and Persons With Disabilities (PWDs) are granted 20% fare discount. This is mandated under Republic Act 9442 (for PWDs), Republic Act 9994 (for Senior Citizens), and Republic Act 11314 (for Students). \nTransport drivers who fail to grant 20% fare discount will be liable to penalty and may have their franchise canceled after repeated offenses.
To know if a tricycle is not a colorum and is franchised in the TODA, the following measures must be observed:

4.1. i-Komyut may allow users to submit content, such as reviews, ratings, comments, and suggestions. By submitting user content, you grant i-Komyut a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free, transferable license to use, display, and distribute the content for the purposes of improving and promoting the app. \n \n4.2. You agree not to submit any user content that is defamatory, harmful, obscene, or violates the rights of others.

2.1. To use i-Komyut, you may be required to register and create an account. You must provide accurate and up-to-date information during the registration process.

2.2. You are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and any activities that occur under your account.

2.3. You must not share your account information or allow others to access your account.
